subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 38 points, including a crucial 3-pointer and six free throws in overtime, for the Cleveland Cavaliers Tuesday night in a 109-104 victory over the visiting Boston Celtics.
snippet: LeBron James scored 38 points, including a crucial 3-pointer and six free throws in overtime, for the Cleveland Cavaliers Tuesday night in a 109-104 victory over the visiting Boston Celtics.
